entities.name: gawp
entities.description: Grawp is described as having tightly curling, close-growing hair the color of bracken and a large fleshy ear. His back is broad and his legs are curled up under his body.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's attempts to teach Grawp English have been heard by other creatures in the forest

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze had warned Harry that Hagrid's attempt to teach Grawp English would not work

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who understands Firenze's warning and realizes that Hagrid's attempts are fruitless

relationships.description: Hagrid is trying to teach Grawp English, but it's not working
Firenze had warned Harry about Hagrid's attempts to teach Grawp English
